title: How Hamas Is Fighting in Gaza
content: Hamas overwhelmed Israel’s border in October with something like a conventional military maneuver. Now, it acts as a guerrilla force, its fighters often disguised as civilians.
summary: Hamas overwhelmed Israel’s border in October with something like a conventional military maneuver. Now, it acts as a guerrilla force, its fighters often disguised as civilians.

title: Ukraine Is Targeting Crimea, a Critical Base for Russia’s Invasion
